sn_nowassist_skill_config.description: Read the knowledge article body and header and provide a short summary in under 4000 characters as well as make suggestions to improve the readability of the article. Provide a readability score between 1 and 10, where 1 meaning this needs a complete rewrite and 10 means the article needs no further work.
sn_nowassist_skill_config.name: Summarise Suggest Knowledge
